text: @realDonaldTrump BS!  They did NOT spy of your corrupt campaign!!  You call covid-19 by a VERY racist name, said it was like the flu, and lie nonstop!  Don't concern yourself with President Biden!  #releaseyourtaxes, you #SATcheater
